Native boolean operations¶

Operations on bool values that are listed here have fast, optimized implementations.

Construction¶

  • True

  • False

  • bool(obj)

Operators¶

  • b1 and b2

  • b1 or b2

  • not b

Functions¶

  • any(expr for ... in ...)

  • all(expr for ... in ...)
